annotation.p: Human narrative companion for the technical assets referenced across the Helios knowledge base.

section.p: We translated the sterile readings from telemetry-events.jsonl into human comprehension. Mara cross-checked the drift inside celestial-navigation-notes.adoc. Every sentence I wrote will be mirrored in the mission-summary.metamd entry.

The operations team adjusted the plan per mission-operations.creole, and Vega acknowledged the update in the briefing wiki. I annotated the knowledge graph at mission-network.dot to capture the comms reroute.

Observation details flow into stellar-observation.docbook, but this journal records the crew reactions. I cited orbital-research.bib entry ellison2045 to justify our detour and attached the session transcript referenced by youtube-solid-principles.json. The diagrams in deployment-diagram.tikz will forever remind me how complex the solution looked, yet how calmly the team executed it.
